A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Superb acting and visuals cannot overcome stupendous plot holes and dishonourable insults of old characters (i.e #NotMyLuke). Vast attention has been paid to the 'lore'\, purely to subvert almost everything noteworthy about Star Wars. 'Let the past die; kill it if you have to'  is the real moral message of this film: Alas\, applying the moral code of a genocidal\, patricidal\, fascist emo will not produce good cinema.
